text: Inene Sayithumela iTorah (kuM청s창), kuyo apho kwakukho isiKhokelo, nokhanyiselo lwabo abaProfeti ababezinikele phantsi kwentando ka-All창h, (ukhanyiselo olo) babegwebela ngalo amaYuda, noorabhi nababingeleli (babegwebela amaYuda ngeTorah), bona babenikwe uxanduva lokukhusela iNcwadi ka-All창h kwaye baba ngawo namangqina ayo. Ke ngoko musani ukoyika abantu koko yoyikani Mna (Hini na nina maYuda). Kananjalo ningathengisi iiVesi zaM, nizithengisele ixabiso elincinane. Yaye abo bangagwebi ngoko uAllah Akutyhilileyo bona ngabangakholwayo
